title: .NET Utvecklare
description:
En kund med hög teknisk mognad söker nu en skicklig **.NET-utvecklare** för ett spännande uppdrag med fokus på systemmodernisering och molnbaserad arkitektur. Uppdraget är på **100 %** och äger rum i **Stockholm** mellan **10 augusti 2025** och **31 december 2025**. **Ansök senast 6 augusti 2025**. Konsulten bör ha **kompetensnivå 2**, med förmåga att snabbt sätta sig in i komplexa tekniska miljöer och driva lösningar framåt i team.


I rollen kommer du att arbeta med utveckling och vidareutveckling av affärskritiska .NET-lösningar i en miljö med höga krav på säkerhet, prestanda och efterlevnad av regelverk. Du blir en nyckelperson i pågående initiativ för att lyfta existerande system från lokal drift till molnbaserade tjänster – primärt i **Microsoft Azure**.


En viktig del av uppdraget är att bidra till förbättrad automatisering och skalbarhet genom moderna utvecklingsmetoder, som **CI/CD, DevOps och containerisering**. Du kommer att samarbeta i tvärfunktionella team där förmåga till tydlig kommunikation och tekniskt ledarskap värderas högt.


Tidigare erfarenhet från projekt inom bank, finans eller försäkring är särskilt värdefullt, likaså insikter i SaaS-omvandlingar och design av framtidssäkra plattformar.

### **Efterfrågade kompetenser:**

* Gedigen erfarenhet av **.NET-utveckling i C#**, gärna i komplexa miljöer
* **Hands-on-erfarenhet av molnmigrering** från on-prem till Azure
* Vana att arbeta med **Azure DevOps** och skapa effektiva **CI/CD-pipelines**
* God förståelse för **SaaS-arkitektur**, integrationer och molnbaserad skalbarhet
* Meriterande med bakgrund inom **bank, försäkring eller finansiell IT**
* Förmåga att förmedla teknisk kunskap på ett pedagogiskt sätt i **agila teammiljöer**


Detta uppdrag passar dig som vill kombinera teknisk spets med verksamhetsnytta, och som drivs av att arbeta med modern teknik i ett uppdrag där dina insatser gör verklig skillnad.

 **Om Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Software Function Developer - Electromobility
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match. At Volvo Group we are dedicated to contributing to industry-leading innovations that will shape the future. With a shared vision of building a better tomorrow, we invite you to join us as our new Software Function Developer for Electrical System Management. With us, you’ll be a part of creating transportation that is safer, more efficient, and more sustainable.

  

Let's collaborate and build the future together, one groundbreaking innovation at a time!

**What you will do**
--------------------

  

As a Software Function Developer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing functionalsolutions on a high level for our electric vehicle systems. You will work closely with our engineering teams todesign and test software systems that enable the functionality of our electric vehicles.  

  

Key responsibilities:

* Develop and implement functional software solutions on a high level for electric vehicle systems togetherwith the tea
* Work in a cross functional team, close together with systems teams to ensure software and systemrequirements are state of the art
* Collaborate closely to ensure that the software systems for electric vehicle functionality meets the highrequirement from our end customer
* Work with internal and external requirements and ensure deliverables meet expectations
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in electric vehicle technology

 **Your future team**

  

Our team is part of the Electromobility Management Department, working closely with other teams both inside and outside our function. We focus on thermal control, power management, and making sure the electrical system runs smoothly—key areas for reliable and efficient electromobility. We believe in teamwork, technology, and innovation, and we make sure to have fun along the way!

**Who are you?**
----------------

  

We are looking for a driven and experienced engineer to join our team and contribute to the development of the automotive and electromobility industry.

  

To be successful in this role, we are looking for the following qualifications:

* MSc degree or equivalent in Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, or a related field
* At least 5 years of experience in software function development in the automotive or electromobility industry
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and as part of a team
* Understanding of automotive systems and customer expectations for electric vehicles
* Knowledge of industry-standard tools and development methods such as Matlab/Targetlink, GIT, CANalyzer, and Vision
* Programming skills in one or more languages, such as C or Python, are a plus
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies
* Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal
* Experience working in an international team
**What’s in it for you?**
-------------------------

  

Our electromobility organization is a fascinating and dynamic area for creative individuals who like to push boundaries and exploring new ideas. Here there is always room for creativity in solving complex issues and challenging the status quo. This while enhancing your professional network, opening doors for future opportunities and growth.

**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------

  

If you are passionate about developing software function solutions for electric vehicle systems and want to be part of a global team dedicated to sustainable transport solutions, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity at Volvo Group.


If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. We are happy to provide more information about the role and how we can work together to drive the future of electromobility.

  

Martin Engström, Manager Electric Management System, martin.p.engstrom@volvo.com.

  

Last application date: 10th of August.

 **Please note that due to summer vacations between Weeks 28–33, we will begin reviewing applications starting from 18th August. We kindly ask for your patience and understanding, and we look forward to receiving your application!**

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

We are committed to shaping the future landscape of efficient, safe, and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents across the group’s leading brands and entities.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, you will be working with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to be able to leave our society in better shape for the next generation. We are passionate about what we do, and we thrive on teamwork. We are almost 100,000 people united around the world by a culture of care, inclusiveness, and empowerment.

 **Group Trucks Technology** are seeking talents to help design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of our team, you’ll help us by engineering exciting next-gen technologies and contribute to projects that determine new, sustainable solutions. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact. Join our design shift that leaves society in good shape for the next generation.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Development at Nolimit City (part of Evolution AB) is a challenging and exciting role where you will be part of a team dedicated to creating solutions that redefine our industry. By working in small, highly collaborative teams, you and your team will have clear ownership of one of our most important new initiatives.
   

  

 At Nolimit City, we optimize for quality, fast flows, and iterative development with short feedback loops. We have a strong focus on end-to-end ownership, continuous improvement, monitoring, and experimentation. We strive to have teams that are inclusive, helpful, and have a strong sense of ownership for what they build. Our engineers make some of the most significant decisions for the company, and we are looking for open and curious developers. As part of the Nolimit City team, you will be part of one of Sweden's fastest-growing companies and contribute to creating value for our players worldwide.
   

  

 We are expanding several of our engineering teams, including the team working on new initiatives with innovative products for our end users and work on our core products.
   

  

 Although we prefer that you're working on-site we also undertand that you have a life outside of work, meaning that working remote from time to time, leaving early, coming in late etc is not something unusual for us. A bit of a cliche; but we do in fact offer a great deal of freedom but with that comes responsibility.
   

  

 What you'll do
   

  

* Own the product from start to finish. Decide how it is best built, tested, deployed, and monitored.
* Work with large-scale, highly available, and robust modern systems.
* Be an integral part of a team and its culture and ways of working.
* Work with automated deployment enabling release multiple times a day.
* Succeed, fail, and learn together with other competent and talented people. We believe in an environment that offers growth opportunities and see education as a result of failure that brings us closer to the next breakthrough.
* Take responsibility for system design, work together with domain architects, own end-to-end problems, manage stakeholder communication, and mentor junior engineers.


 Who you are
   

  

* Tech stack should include: JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, React, Java.
* Experience with advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks
* Experience with APIs and product development
* A passion for writing clear and sustainable code
* Experience with agile methodologies, continuous integration, continuous delivery
* Good spoken and written English skills
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and takes ownership of the change from editor to production system
* We understand that you might not have experience in all the areas listed above, but as long as you have the ambition and willingness to learn we would like to hear from you.


 Some of our technologies
   

  

* Javascript / TypeScript
* React / NextJS
* Redux / Redux-Toolkit Query
* Strapi (Headless CMS)
* Node.js and Express.js
* Java 17, Dropwizard
* MySQL
* PostgreSQL
* AWS, Ubuntu, Docker, GitHub Actions


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Perception Software Engineer
description:
**Company**
 Qualcomm Auto Ltd Sweden Filial
   

  

**Job Area**
 Engineering Group, Engineering Group > Software Engineering
   

  

**General Summary**
 Are you passionate about advancing
 **ADAS** 
 and
 **Autonomous Driving** 
 systems? Imagine contributing to a safer world while collaborating with brilliant, creative, and enjoyable colleagues. Dive into exciting and challenging technology—apply today for this rewarding opportunity!
   

  

**We are Perception within Qualcomm Automotive**
 Qualcomm is an American multinational corporation known for our creation of semiconductors, software, and services related to wireless technology.
   

  

 Our Perception organization belong to the Automotive branch delivering the Snapdragon Digital Chassis - a set of cloud-connected platforms for telematics and connectivity, digital cockpit, and driver assistance and autonomy.
   

  

 As a Perception Software Engineer at Qualcomm Automotive, you will design, develop, create, modify and validate state-of-the-art computer vision software for autonomous driving and advanced driver assistance systems. You will be part of Requirement Area Spatial Awareness, working closely with experts in different areas within computer vision. You will have the opportunity to contribute with your expertise as well as learn from other highly skilled developers. Together you develop algorithms for Detection of Freespace, i.e. Drivable area for the vehicle, enabling autonomous braking, adaptive cruise control and high-level autonomy.
   

  

 As a member of one of our cross functional teams, you will be performing tasks covering all parts of the product development cycle, including software design, machine learning, hands on work with data, testing, writing requirements and functional safety.
   

  

**Minimum Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 4+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.


 OR
   

  

 Master's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 3+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.
   

  

 OR
   

  

 PhD in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 2+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.
   

  

* 2+ years of work experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.


 As a person, we are looking for you who have a drive and “can do”-attitude, as well as the willingness to learn and expand your skillset in new areas. We also believe you are highly motivated and a pragmatic problem solver. Preferably, you also have previous experience from leadership positions as Team Lead or Tech Lead.
   

  

 We are looking for someone who matches at least 2-3 of the descriptions below:
   

  

* Software Development: You have a robust software development background, preferably complemented by expertise in system design and architecture (required).
* Language and Tools: Proficiency in languages and tools for machine learning and SW development, particularly and C/C++, python and tensorflow.
* Machine Learning: You bring practical experience in machine learning development, gained from relevant industry contexts. This includes practical experience of working with and developing the datasets used.
* Computer Vision: You have experience from applying algorithms to solve complex problems within Computer Vision.


**Preferred Qualification**
* Master’s degree or PhD in Engineering Physics, Machine Learning, Computer Science or related field.
* 8+ years of Software Engineering, Computer Vision, Machine learning and/or related work experience.
* 1+ years in leadership position (Team Lead, Tech Lead, Project Lead or similar)
* References to a particular number of years experience are for indicative purposes only. Applications from candidates with equivalent experience will be considered, provided that the candidate can demonstrate an ability to fulfill the principal duties of the role and possesses the required competencies.


 Qualcomm is an equal opportunity employer. If you are an individual with a disability and need an accommodation during the application/hiring process, rest assured that Qualcomm is committed to providing an accessible process. You may e-mail disability-accomodations@qualcomm.com or call Qualcomm's toll-free number found here. Upon request, Qualcomm will provide reasonable accommodations to support individuals with disabilities to be able participate in the hiring process. Qualcomm is also committed to making our workplace accessible for individuals with disabilities. (Keep in mind that this email address is used to provide reasonable accommodations for individuals with disabilities. We will not respond here to requests for updates on applications or resume inquiries).
   

  

 Qualcomm expects its employees to abide by all applicable policies and procedures, including but not limited to security and other requirements regarding protection of Company confidential information and other confidential and/or proprietary information, to the extent those requirements are permissible under applicable law.
   

  

**To all Staffing and Recruiting Agencies** 
 : Our Careers Site is only for individuals seeking a job at Qualcomm. Staffing and recruiting agencies and individuals being represented by an agency are not authorized to use this site or to submit profiles, applications or resumes, and any such submissions will be considered unsolicited. Qualcomm does not accept unsolicited resumes or applications from agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Qualcomm employees or any other company location. Qualcomm is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/applications.
   

  

 If you would like more information about this role, please contact Qualcomm Careers.

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
Rovio is part of the SEGA family and world famous for our flagship IP Angry Birds - want to know more about Rovio as an employer? Click here.
   

  

 Are you ready to join us as a Principal Software Engineer and be a driving force in strengthening our studio's technical craft? In this role, you'll be building our engineering excellence and supporting the studio Technical Director in shaping the technical roadmap for Rovio's biggest game with over a million daily users - Angry Birds 2!
   

  

 Your mission is to elevate the overall development practices in the studio and bring us to the industry forefront when it comes to using AI in our software development processes.
   

  

 We're incredibly excited about leveraging AI within our workflows and tooling, and you'll play a key role in making that happen. If you're ready to champion a culture of technical innovation and AI literacy, we want to hear from you!
   

  

 This role brings significant value through close collaboration and direct impact on our studio's culture and future roadmap. For this reason, we would want you to be onsite in our Stockholm studio for the majority of the week. Currently not based in Sweden? No problem at all, we will help you with relocation and work permit if needed!
   

  

**You Will Have Impact And Fun At Work By**
- 

 Supporting defining robust, scalable, and high-performing frameworks, tools, and architecture for Angry Birds 2.
   

  

* Shaping the studio's long-term technical roadmap specifically for AI, identifying emerging trends, and evaluating new AI technologies.
* Analyzing the efficiency of existing technologies, tools, and practices, and leading initiatives for improvement.
* Finding smart solutions to support multiple feature developments and legacy refactoring, ensuring our game performs even with increasing daily active users.
* Diving deep into the code and being ready to work hands on, solving problems when they arise and constantly working to prevent those from happening in the first place.
* Guiding and mentoring other engineers, fostering a culture of technical growth and AI literacy within the studio.


**Experience And Skills We Are Looking For**
- 

 Proven track record of setting and driving technical strategy that directly supports business objectives.
   

  

* Strong expertise in software engineering principles and practices, as well as experience creating technical guidelines and other relevant documentation.
* Extensive technical leadership experience in the video game industry or large-scale applications, demonstrating the ability to define and architect substantial games or services.
* Hands-on experience in both utilizing and implementing AI solutions.
* Proficiency in Unity and C#.
* You excel at communicating your vision to various stakeholders and leading strategic efforts within the game team.
* You’re enthusiastic about quality and innovation with a drive to improve, challenge, and bring new solutions and ideas.


 It would be nice if you also have the following skills:
   

  

- 

 Experience defining and refining software development processes.
   

  

* Hands on experience on games built in Unity and other leading middleware engine solutions.
* You're comfortable navigating and improving existing, large-scale codebases


 Please send your CV in English. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 We welcome applicants to use the name they want to be addressed by in the application form, regardless of whether it is their legal name.
   

  

 At Rovio, we are also committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities or conditions in our working environment and job application procedures. We are committed to continuously improving workplace accessibility. If you have any questions before applying, please write to us at recruitment@rovio.com.

title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer (Java) - ZEOS
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, Retail, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Over the last years, we learned that solving fulfillment-related challenges for the good of our customers helps us to fuel the growth of our platform. With more partners in Partner Program and Connected Retail joining our platform, we have been developing and testing additional further fulfilment services tailored to their needs.
   

  

 As a Senior Full Stack Software Engineer at ZEOS, Zalando’s B2B Logistics unit developing Europe’s leading Logistics Platform recently launched under the ZEOS Logistics brand, you will be part of a team working on designing technical solutions to connect various e-commerce platforms seamlessly with the robust logistics ecosystem of ZEOS.
   

  

 You will ensure that all our operational processes like warehousing, inventory management, inventory distribution, deliveries and returns can be steered on various e-commerce platforms. You will have the chance to learn about the broad business background we’re working with. In line with the overall Zalando philosophy you bring visibility and transparency to processes and thus have a huge impact on our customers and key stakeholders.
   

  

**WHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)**
* You work regularly with others to ensure the right software/engineering design approaches and methodologies are applied.
* Design, develop, deploy, operate and improve software solutions that have a direct impact on our daily business with our partners.
* Discuss and design APIs and integrated solutions.
* Based on our microservices architecture, you and your team will own your code, and decide on the technologies and tools to deliver as well as operate large-scale applications on AWS.
* Working like a startup in an agile environment & taking ownership for the whole development cycle - from architecture design to testing to implementation & maintenance. Write applications from scratch with the latest technologies free of your choice.
* Shape and champion an inclusive culture and diverse team environment.


**WE'D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF**
* 10+ years of software engineering experience
* You have a deep understanding of microservice architecture, REST services and API design. Good knowledge of security concepts. Highly versed in deploying and operating applications in a cloud infrastructure.
* You are highly skilled as a Java Developer. Proven experience in frameworks like Spring Boot. Ideally you have experience with a distributed event store such as Apache Kafka.
* Experience with Frontend technologies like JavaScript (ES6 / ES2015), React, Typescript, Webpack, CSS/HTML, and showing interest in full stack development is a big Plus!
* You have a good understanding of PostgreSQL and cloud architectures/platforms (preferably AWS). Check our Tech Radar for more information on the technologies we use at Zalando.
* Demonstrated strong sense of ownership, entrepreneurial & analytical thinking add to your excellent communication skills.
* Ideally, you have experience integrating third-party services, such as through developing or working with middleware solutions.
* Shopify or other e-commerce experience is a merit.


**OUR OFFER**
 Zalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
   

  

  

* 40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
* Hybrid working model with 60% remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
* Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
* 30 days of vacation a year
* Health and wellbeing options
* Learn all about Zalando and our values here https //jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh\_src=22377bdd1us


*We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.*

title: Senior ServiceNow Utvecklare
description:
Centric söker nu en Senior ServiceNow-utvecklare / Business Analyst inom SPM/APM. Vill du vara med och vidareutveckla en av de mest använda ServiceNow-plattformarna i Sverige?
   

  

 Vi söker en engagerad och lösningsorienterad person med erfarenhet av Service Portfolio Management (SPM) och Application Portfolio Management (APM) till vår kund i Stockholm. Du blir en viktig del i ett väletablerat förvaltningsteam där samarbete mellan utvecklare, analytiker, designers och serviceansvariga står i centrum. Tillsammans arbetar ni för att förbättra upplevelsen för över 20 000 användare inom organisationen.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att bygga vidare på sina karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 I rollen som ServiceNow utvecklare kommer du att ha både ett strategiskt och ett operativt ansvar för vidareutvecklingen av ServiceNow.
   

  

**Dina Arbetsuppgifter Inkluderar**
* Bidra med expertis inom SPM och APM, både på konceptuell och teknisk nivå
* Utveckla och underhålla skript, integrationer och regelverk (t.ex. Business Rules, Client Scripts, Script Includes, ACL)
* Översätta affärsbehov till tekniska lösningar
* Aktivt delta i workshops och samtal med verksamheten för att förstå behov och mål
* Arbeta med olika delar av plattformen som Performance Analytics, CMDB och portföljhantering (SPM/APM)


**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
**Krav**
* Högskoleutbildning inom relevant område eller motsvarande yrkeserfarenhet
* Gedigen erfarenhet av utveckling i ServiceNow
* Erfarenhet av att implementera och arbeta med SPM-lösningar
* Van att kommunicera och arbeta nära verksamheten, gärna genom workshops och kravinsamling
* Tidigare arbetat med förvaltning, felsökning och incidenthantering
* Talar och skriver flytande på svenska och engelska


**Meriterande kunskaper**
* On-prem eller självhostade lösningar
* Uppgraderingsprojekt i ServiceNow
* Implementering av olika moduler inom plattformen
* Certifieringar som t.ex. CSA, CAD, CIS ITSM, SPM Fundamentals eller CIS-APM


**Övrigt**
*Tjänsten omfattas av säkerhetsskyddade krav och det kan därför krävas att du har specifikt medborgarskap och att du godkänns enligt gällande säkerhetsprövningar.*
**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 Vi hjälper dig att nå dina personliga mål. Vi tycker nämligen att alla våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas, oavsett om de är juniorer eller har några år på nacken. Därför erbjuder vi alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Och inte nog med det – du som konsult får även lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan utifrån dina speciella intresseområden, där vi tar notan för både studiematerial och certifieringar. Hos oss på Centric kommer du snabbt in i gemenskapen genom våra interna och externa aktiviteter där vi träffas och hittar på något roligt tillsammans.
   

  

 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Senior Platform Engineer
description:
**TL;DR**
 We’re looking for an exceptional platform engineer to design and scale the infrastructure behind the future of AI software engineering. You’ll own key parts of our backend, devops, and platform tooling - ensuring speed, reliability, and scalability across our stack.
   

  

**Why Lovable?**
* Change the world, literally: 2025 is the year AI works, and Lovable has the best AI full stack engineer product (According to industry veterans)
* Work, learn, have fun: We’re building the strongest technical team in Europe. You will shape our culture and be inspired in a place of exceptional talent density
* Build a unique network: Lovable is a global top AI brand that the world is eager to work with. You will meet and work with some of the most important people in tech
* Get autonomy & ownership: With lots of things being built, this is a unique opportunity to get ownership and have a true impact on our product
* Compensation: Lovable pays top of market cash and equity, and is committed to compensate better than any other company in Sweden on a performance basis


**What We’re Looking For**
* You have 5-7+ years of experience building production infrastructure as a Platform Engineer, DevOps Engineer, Site Reliability Engineer or similar
* You’ve helped scale platforms at global tech startups and scale-ups - startup experience is a must
* You’ve worked on distributed systems, CI/CD pipelines, internal tooling, observability, and cloud infrastructure
* You have experience with Docker, Kubernetes and modern infra practices
* You have strong programming skills and a track record of improving dev velocity and system reliability
* You’re a problem-solver who thrives on challenges and ships high-leverage systems fast
* You’re comfortable navigating ambiguity and figuring things out on the fly
* You care about security, stability, and speed—but know when to optimize and when to move
* You’re based in Stockholm or ready to relocate - this is an on-site, 5-days-a-week role


**Your Responsibilities**
**In one sentence:** 
 Own and scale the platform that makes AI engineering work for everyone
   

  

* Build and maintain the systems that power our AI product—from backend performance to cloud deployments
* Improve developer experience: streamline our CI/CD pipelines, internal tools, and observability stack
* Harden our infrastructure against failures, downtime, and slowdowns
* Collaborate across teams - from product, frontend and backend - to ensure fast and reliable delivery
* Own your roadmap, architect systems, and carry them through to deployment


**Our tech stack**
 We build with tools both humans and AI love:
   

  

* Frontend: React for lightning-fast interfaces
* Backend: Golang and Rust for serious performance
* Cloud: Cloudflare, Fly.io, Google Cloud Run, AWS, Terraform
* DevOps & Tooling: CI/CD pipelines, observability, infra-as-code—you help shape this layer


 And we’re always exploring what’s next.
   

  

**How Applying Works**
* Fill in a short form, then jump on an initial exploratory call
* Complete a technical take-home exercise
* Dive deeper into your thinking during two technical interviews
* Join us on-site for 1–2 days of trial work if possible - get to know the team and see if Lovable is the right place for you


**About Your Application**
 Please submit your application in English (our company language). We treat all candidates equally - if you’re interested, apply through our system using the link below.

title: Senior Integration Consultant
description:
**”Accelerating business to improve the lives of people”. This is our purpose statement and encapsulates what we enthusiastically do every day. We integrate our customers’ IT systems to make sure that the right data is at the right place at the right time when they digitalize their processes. Companies need their systems to talk to each other to ensure that cars roll off the factory line, that everyone receives their payments on time, and that you can buy what you need from a supermarket.**
**Our success story began in 1986, when we helped the German automotive industry to digitalize their paper-based supply chains. Today, SEEBURGER is a leading global B2B software provider with more than 1,000 #businessaccelerators in 15 countries worldwide and over 10,000 satisfied customers that rely on our innovative solutions.**
**The Position**
 At SEEBURGER, integration is more than a buzzword—it's our mission. As a trusted global leader in business integration, we serve customers ranging from local SMEs to the world’s top financial institutions, logistics providers, retailers and automotive giants.
   

  

 We are searching for a
 **Senior Integration Consultant to join our growing team in Sweden** 
 . This is a key role for someone who wants to work hands-on with integration solutions, support strategic digital transformation, and guide clients with best-practice architecture and implementation.
   

  

 Location: Ideally based in Stockholm, Sweden. Some travel expected for customer workshops and kick-offs.
   

  

 As a Senior Integration Consultant at SEEBURGER, you'll work at the intersection of technology and business, designing, implementing, and optimizing integration flows using our Business Integration Suite (BIS). You'll collaborate closely with clients and internal teams, bringing together systems, applications, and business processes into a cohesive digital ecosystem.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Implement integration flows using SEEBURGER BIS, with a focus on B2B/EDI, API, EAI, and MFT.
* Design and adapt integration architectures tailored to customer requirements.
* Work closely with customers to analyze existing processes, identify improvements, and advise on the optimal integration strategy.
* Support technical workshops, onboarding sessions, and customer training initiatives.
* Contribute in pre-sales efforts when needed by offering technical insights and validating integration use cases.
* Build strong, long-term relationships with customers and become a trusted technical advisor.


**Your Profile**
* 5+ years of experience in IT integration or related consulting roles.
* Hands-on experience in at least one or more of the following: B2B integration, MFT, EAI, or API management.
* Solid understanding of IT infrastructure, including Windows/Linux environments, databases, and application servers.
* Strong communication skills and an ability to understand and articulate customer needs.
* Ability to drive smaller integration projects independently, and contribute to larger project teams.
* A developer mindset – comfortable reading code and understanding how systems interact, though this is not a coding-heavy role.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.


**Nice to Have**
* Experience with integration platforms like Mulesoft, Axway, IBM, Dell Boomi, or SAP PI/PO.
* Familiarity with messaging standards like EDIFACT, XML, JSON, SWIFT, etc.
* Skills in Java, scripting languages, Docker, CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins).
* Previous work with industries such as automotive, logistics, retail, manufacturing, or finance.


**Why Join SEEBURGER?**
* Be part of a growing, global company with strong local presence in Sweden.
* Work hands-on with industry-leading integration technology.
* Join a tight-knit and experienced team where collaboration, knowledge sharing, and mutual support are core values.
* Enjoy a hybrid work setup – we encourage in-office collaboration (typically 3 days per week in Stockholm or Gothenburg), with flexibility depending on project needs.
* Influence the digital journeys of leading companies while building your own technical and strategic expertise.


 If you’re passionate about integration, eager to work with real impact across diverse industries, and enjoy guiding customers with a hands-on and consultative approach — we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

**Benefit from being part of a globally renowned company that is driving digitalisation forward. We continue to grow - and so can you! It is important to us that you can fully utilise your talents and strengths and go your own way, regardless of whether you are aiming for a specialist or management career. With our expertise and growth in a future-oriented industry, we offer a wide range of opportunities and secure jobs. At SEEBURGER, we value the supportive atmosphere and family environment. #StrongerTogether is one of our corporate values and characterises the way we live together.**
**Sounds exciting? Become a #Businessaccelerator today!**

title: Dokumentatör - Expisoft - tillväxtbolag inom cybersäkerhet
description:
Hos oss får du en central roll i arbetet med att dokumentera avancerade system och lösningar inom cybersäkerhet och skydd av samhällskritisk infrastruktur.

**Din roll hos oss**  

Du blir en nyckelperson i våra projekt och ansvarar för att skapa dokumentation som uppfyller högt ställda krav på säkerhet, tydlighet och spårbarhet. Det kan handla om:

* Tekniska beskrivningar och dokumentation av applikationer, säkerhetsarkitektur och tjänster
* Systemdokumentation för säkerhetsklassade miljöer
* Användarmanualer, systemöversikter, driftsdokument och säkerhetsspecifikationer
* Stöd i processer som rör informationssäkerhet, säkerhetsskydd och kontinuitet
* Att tillsammans med teamet ta gemensamt ansvar för våra projekt samt generera kvalitet och punktlighet i våra leveranser


Du arbetar nära utvecklare, arkitekter, säkerhetsexperter och projektledare – ofta i agila team med högt i tak och möjlighet att bidra med mer än bara dokumentation.

**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har erfarenhet av teknisk dokumentation, informationsarkitektur eller liknande
* Är en strukturerad och analytisk skribent med ett genuint intresse för teknik
* Kommunicerar tydligt på svenska (och engelska) – både tekniskt och pedagogiskt
* Vi söker dig som både kan skapa och uppskattar välformulerad text
* Är van vid att ta reda på information genom att fråga, läsa kod eller gräva i system
* Har en hög social kompetens och kommer väl överens med kollegor
* Förstår eller vill lära dig om cybersäkerhet, Windows, Linux, nätverk och standarder som ISO 27001 eller NIS2

**Meriterande kompetens**  

Några års erfarenhet från utveckling av IT-system, testning och nätverk.

* Erfarenhet från säkerhetskänslig verksamhet eller arbete under säkerhetsskyddsavtal
* Erfarenhet av och ett intresse av att arbeta med testning
* Intresse för layout och UX

**Krav:**

* Svensk medborgare (dubbelt medborgarskap inom EU/NATO är acceptabelt)
* Villkor för anställning är godkänd säkerhetsprövning inklusive registerkontroll

**Hos oss får du:**

* En nyckelroll i ett svenskt cybersäkerhetsföretag som är med och stärker Sveriges digitala motståndskraft
* Möjligheten att arbeta med avancerad teknik och säkerhetskritiska lösningar, där dokumentationen är lika viktig som koden den beskriver
* En arbetsmiljö präglad av förtroende, professionalism och genuin kollegial värme – här hjälps vi åt, utvecklas tillsammans och tar både säkerhet och människor på allvar

**Om Expisoft**  

Expisoft är ett svenskägt välskött företag med lönsam tillväxt och högsta kreditbetyg.


Vi är en betrodd leverantör av högsäkerhetslösningar och tjänster till både civila och militära organisationer med en historik tillbaka till 1990-talet. Alla anställda är registerkontrollerade och med expertis inom cybersäkerhet med högsta skyddsvärde. Vår teknologi hjälper myndigheter, kommuner, försvarsindustri och företag att skydda sin verksamhet, system, nätverk och information mot varierade IT-säkerhetsrelaterade hot. Våra lösningar möter de allra högsta säkerhetskraven inom såväl civil som militär verksamhet.

**Ansökan**


Skicka in din ansökan med CV och personligt brev till bjorn.akerman@managementpartners så snart som möjligt. Management Partners ansvarar för rekryteringen till denna roll - vi gör löpande utvärdering av de ansökningar vi får in.


Har du frågor om rollen? Kontakta Björn Åkerman på 070-634 60 24.


Bli en del av Expisoft och hjälp oss skapa framtidens säkerhetslösningar – där tydlig och genomtänkt dokumentation är nyckeln till framgång!

title: Chief Product Officer (Gaming)
description:
Please note that this position location is in Sweden and is open to locals, expats, or candidates ready to relocate.
 



  





**About the Role:** 




 Our client is a fast-growing gaming and software startup with a strong foundation in Asia and ambitious plans to expand across Europe. They are seeking a visionary and hands-on Chief Product Officer (CPO) to lead the product organization, with a special focus on B2B slot games, gaming platforms, and live-streaming technologies.
 



 This is a unique opportunity to join an innovative company at a pivotal growth stage—shaping the entire product strategy, roadmap, and delivery in a highly competitive market.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 



* Define and execute the global product vision and strategy, with a focus on B2B slot game delivery and platform innovation.
* Lead and mentor a cross-functional product team including product managers, UX/UI designers, business analysts, and marketing liaisons.
* Collaborate closely with the engineering, operations, and commercial teams to ensure product development aligns with market needs and business goals.
* Own the full product lifecycle: from market research and ideation to go-to-market, iteration, and optimization.
* Drive user-centric thinking and data-driven decision-making across all product initiatives.
* Engage regularly with key clients, partners, and internal stakeholders to capture feedback and adapt strategies.
* Monitor competitive landscape, industry trends, and regulatory changes in gaming and iGaming to keep products ahead of the curve.
* Lead roadmap planning, prioritize product features, and manage timelines for multiple projects running concurrently.
* Optimize product performance through analytics, experimentation, and feedback loops.
* Manage product budget and resources effectively to ensure ROI and scalability.



  





**Who We’re Looking For:** 



* 10+ years of experience in product leadership, with at least 5 years in a senior role such as CPO, VP of Product, Product Director or Head of Product.
* Deep domain knowledge of the slot gaming industry, with strong B2B product delivery experience.
* Proven ability to lead and scale product teams in a fast-paced, global environment.
* Hands-on experience with gaming platforms, live streaming, and digital entertainment products.
* Strong commercial acumen and experience working closely with sales, marketing, and operations.
* Comfortable managing products in a regulated environment (e.g. iGaming, fintech, or media).
* Skilled in using data and customer feedback to drive product innovation and prioritization.
* Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills.
* Experience managing multicultural teams and working across time zones.
* Fluency in English is essential; knowledge of Swedish is a plus.

title: Paid Social Specialist
description:
Är du en fena på sociala medier och brinner för att skapa resultat genom träffsäkra kampanjer? Har du erfarenhet av att optimera, analysera och utveckla strategier för paid social? Då kan du vara den vi söker!
 



  





**OM ROLLEN** 




 Anställningsform: Heltidsanställning
 



 Ort: Stockholm
 



  





 Som Paid Social specialist på Adgrabber kommer du att arbeta med planering, implementering och optimering av paid social-kampanjer på plattformar som Meta (Facebook/Instagram), LinkedIn, TikTok och Snapchat. I rollen får du ansvar för att stötta våra kunder genom alla delar av samarbetet, från strategisk rådgivning och analys till slutleverans och rapportering.
 



  





**VEM ÄR DU?** 




 Du har bevisad erfarenhet med ansvar för daglig hantering och optimering av kampanjer inom paid social.
 



 Du tar ansvar för att förstå och översätta en kunds affärsmål till en digital marknadsföringsstrategi inklusive analys och mätbara KPI:er.
 



 Du har starka organisatoriska- och prioriteringsfärdigheter för att hantera flera arbetsförfrågningar och projekt samtidigt.
 



 Du har utmärkt analytiska färdigheter och ett datadrivet mindset.
 



 Du är nyfiken på att hitta och hålla dig uppdaterad gällande nya branschteknologier och verktyg för att säkerställa att nya möjligheter testas och implementeras för våra kunder.
 



 Du har en förmåga att självständigt driva projekt och leverera resultat men är samtidigt en lagspelare som bidrar med idéer och feedback.
 



  





**KRAV** 




 Minst 2-3 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med paid social-kampanjer, gärna från byråsidan.
 



 Gedigen kunskap om annonsverktygen på de stora sociala plattformarna (Meta, LinkedIn, TikTok etc.).
 



 Stark analytisk förmåga och vana att arbeta med data för att fatta beslut.
 



 Förståelse och erfarenhet av GA4, Google Looker Studio, Google Sheets.
 



 Stark kommunikatör och presentatör på svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.
 



  





**EXTRA MERITERANDE:** 




 Certifieringar inom relevanta plattformar.
 



 Kunskap och erfarenhet inom tekniska områden kopplat till pixlar/spårningsscript. 
 



 Kunskap och erfarenhet inom andra digitala områden (SEM, Programmatic, SEO, CRO/UX, dataanalys i andra plattformar såsom Matomo, Piwik mfl.)
 



 Förståelse och erfarenhet av Supermetrics.
 



  





**VARFÖR ADGRABBER?** 




 Hos oss blir du en del av ett drivet, nyfiket och prestigelöst team. Vi tror på helhetsgrepp inom marknadsföring och jobbar nära våra kunder för att skapa strategier som faktiskt gör skillnad.
 



 Vår arbetsplats präglas av expertis, värme och en kultur där vi utmanar både oss själva och våra kunder för att nå bästa möjliga resultat. En kultur där vi kombinerar strategi med kreativitet – och där vi bryr oss om varandra. En byrå som är på en spännande tillväxtresa och där vi hela tiden tänker framåt.
 



  





 Låter det som en match? Hör av dig! Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig.

title: Projektledare/Tekniskt stöd - Införande av IT system
description:
**Introduktion**  
Åt stora statliga kunder söker vi flera personer som har nedan profil! Rekryteringsmöjligheterna dyker upp löpande varför vi tar ansökningar löpande. Se bara till att passa in i profilen som nämns nedan så återkommer vi till dig!

**Uppdragsbeskrivning:**

Systemförvaltaren i Malmö stad behöver stöd för att driva olika delprojekt samt starta upp förvaltningsorganisationen för Kommers. Delprojekten kan t ex gällla integrationer som behöver göras med andra befintliga system samt andra utvecklingsprojekt.

Det krävs mycket kommunikation med berörda förvaltningar och personer och en lyhördhet för organisationens behov.

Uppdraget innebär följande:

* Självständigt kunna läsa in sig på en stor mängd information (avtal, organisation, samverkansplan mm) som krävs för att kunna ta fram nedan punkter
* Starta upp och få igång förvaltningsorganisationen
* Färdigställa rollbeskrivningar och arbetsbeskrivningar
* Vara delaktig i och även hålla i egna möten
* Sätta upp en kommunikationsstruktur i Teams
* Kan bli akutellt att leda olika typer av delprojekt (E-signering, intregration mot diariesystem, integratioin med datalager osv)

**Önskvärda kompetenser**

* Erfarenhet av projektledning samt systemförvaltning
* Kunna kommunicera på ett pedagoiskt sätt till en stor organistion vid t ex möten och presentationer
* Strukturerad
* Självständig och driven
* Hög samarbetsförmåga
* Kunnig inom projektledning/förändringsledning
* Kunnig inom systemförvaltning
* Offentlg sektor
* Meriterande att ha erferenhet av systemet Kommers.

title: Software engineer C#
description:
**Role: Full-Stack Software Engineer (C# / Angular / DevOps)**


Are you a developer who thrives at the intersection of clean code, modern DevOps practices, and intuitive user interfaces? We are looking for a skilled and proactive software engineer to join our team, contributing to both backend and frontend development while also taking part in shaping a robust CI/CD pipeline.

### **Responsibilities**

* **Design and implement robust backend solutions** using C# and the .NET ecosystem, ensuring maintainability and performance.
* **Take ownership of CI/CD workflows**, leveraging GitHub and Azure DevOps to streamline automated testing, deployment, and delivery processes.
* **Work closely with cross-functional teams** including product owners, designers, and other engineers to turn concepts into scalable software solutions.
* **Build and enhance frontend applications** with Angular, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly experience.
* **Proactively debug and resolve technical issues**, applying best practices for root cause analysis and long-term stability.
* **Contribute to overall codebase health**, promoting clean architecture, modular design, and automation across the development lifecycle.

### **️ Core Competencies**

* **Strong experience with C# and the .NET platform**, with a passion for writing clean, efficient, and testable code.
* **Hands-on knowledge of DevOps tools and workflows**, including source control (GitHub), automated pipelines, and release management in Azure DevOps.
* **Solid grasp of modern JavaScript frameworks**, particularly Angular, with experience building SPAs and component-based interfaces.
* **Understanding of design patterns and software architecture**, including principles like SOLID and clean code practices.
* **Excellent analytical thinking and debugging skills**, with a keen eye for detail.
* **Strong collaboration skills**, with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in a team-oriented, agile environment.

**About** **Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting is a specialized staffing and recruitment firm focused on the IT sector. We collaborate with leading tech companies and innovative startups to provide exciting career opportunities for individuals passionate about digital development. With our deep technical expertise and extensive network, we efficiently match the right talents with the right assignments. At Rasulson Consulting, you’ll receive personalized guidance, regular feedback, and the chance to take the next step in your IT career.

title: Sektionschef IT för kraftsystemdrift
description:
**Sektionschef IT för kraftsystemdrift**
========================================


Sista ansökningsdatum: 13 augusti

Svenska kraftnät är en nyckelaktör i energiomställningen. Vår IT-division växer för att möjliggöra en fördubblad elproduktion och en fossilfri framtid. Med den senaste tekniken ökar vi både infrastrukturens kapacitet och utvecklingstakten inom digitalisering och processer.


**Om tjänsten**
---------------



I samband med en organisationsutveckling inom avdelningen IT för Kraftsystem och Elmarknad inom division IT, där nya sektionsindelningar införs, söker vi nu en sektionschef för IT för kraftsystemdrift. Rollen är nyinrättad och erbjuder dig en unik möjlighet att leda och utveckla sektionen. Du kommer att bidra i avdelningens vidare implementering av den nya organisationen som innebär att utveckla och effektivisera arbetssätt för att möta verksamhetens i de snabba förändringar som sker.



Som sektionschef har du personal- verksamhets- och ekonomiskt ansvar för sektionens mål och leveranser. Du har personalansvar för sektionens enhetschefer samt roller som finns i sektionens gemensamma funktion. Du rapporterar till avdelningschef IT för Kraftsystem och Elmarknad och stöttar även denne i t.ex. verksgemensamma frågeställningar och utveckling. Som sektionschef kommer du att


* Leda sektionens tre enheter med enhetschefer
* Inneha viktig roll i sektionens leveranser både utveckling som förvaltning
* Delta i styrgrupps- och ledningsgruppsarbete
* Styra, leda och arbeta med verksamhetsutveckling för sektionen och uppdrag
* Stötta avdelningschef och bidra i att nå avdelningens strategiska riktning och mål
* Stötta och utveckla underställda chefer i deras roller


Avdelningen har det övergripande strategiska och operativa leveransansvaret av de IT-lösningar som möjliggör att Svenska kraftnät kan leverera enligt uppdraget inom systemansvaret. Till det hör allt från styrning, övervakning och balansering av kraftsystemet till att göra analyser på kort och lång sikt samt säkerställa en fungerande elmarknad.



Sektionen har det strategiska och operativa leveransansvaret av de IT-lösningar som möjliggör drift och planering av kraftsystemet.



Uppdraget är att möta verksamhetens behov över tid genom att kunna erbjuda moderna IT-lösningar som möjliggör att verksamheten når sina mål, både i det operativa och strategiska, för att kunna upprätthålla systemansvaret med balansering av transmissionsnätet.



Genom den pågående energiomställningen där Svenska kraftnät, och IT, har en viktig roll finns stora möjligheter till löpande utveckling. Det är en central roll i att leverera kritiska IT-lösningar till vår kärnverksamhet och uppdrag där framtidens stamnät kräver nya och adaptiva IT-lösningar utifrån kraftsystemets förändring.


**Om dig**
----------


**Skallkrav**



För denna roll söker vi dig som har ett driv att nå resultat i samarbete med chefer, medarbetare och andra intressenter i och utanför organisationen. Det är mycket som händer i den utvecklingsfas som Svenska kraftnät just nu befinner sig vilket gör du behöver vara en person som är stabil och bra på att skapa hållbara strukturer i ditt arbetssätt. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.



Du har en relevant akademisk examen såsom ingenjör, data-/informationsvetenskap eller systemutveckling alternativt motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt. Du har även erfarenhet


* Att under flera år lett genom andra ledare, exempelvis som chef över chefer på mellannivå eller högre, med ansvar för både personal, resultat och budget.
* Av strategiskt arbete inom såväl verksamhetsutveckling och förändringsledning
* Av att arbeta med internationella leverantörer utifrån styrning, hantering av IT-avtal och uppföljning av leveranser och samarbete med externa parter


Du har också mycket god kommunikativ förmåga i tal och skrift i svenska och engelska.  

  

Vi ser det som **meriterande** om du har erfarenhet av


* IT-system med stor komplexitet och utvecklingstakt i kombination med höga tillgänglighets- och säkerhetskrav
* Att ha arbetat med säkerhetskänslig verksamhet
* Nordisk/Europeiskt samarbete - t.ex. inom energifrågor
* IT-lösningar inom energi- eller elkraftsbranschen
* Arbete i chefsroll inom offentlig verksamhet

**Bra att veta**
----------------


* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg.
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 % #LI-hybrid.
* Resor kan förekomma några gånger per år, främst inom Norden.
* Sista ansökningsdag: **2025-08-13.** Du kommer att få svara på ett antal frågor istället för ett personligt brev och behöver bara bifoga ditt CV.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning.
* I denna rekryteringsprocess tillämpas tester.
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


**Vid frågor, kontakta gärna**


* Cumhur Sel, rekryterande chef, 010 475 82 14
* Victoria Waltenberg, rekryterare, 010 350 90 45
* Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72
* Erica Midfjäll, ST, 010 475 87 31

Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se. Under sommaren kan vi ha längre svarstider med anledning av semestertider.



Jobba här – bli en viktig del av vår energiframtid | Svenska kraftnät



Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare i samband med rekrytering, vi har upphandlade avtal som gäller för Svenska kraftnät som statlig myndighet.


**Övrig information**
---------------------


Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Decision Analyst
description:
##### **About the role**


As a Decision Analyst at Instabee, you’ll play a key role in helping us make smarter, faster decisions across the business. You’ll partner with teams across the company from product, operations, to tech and beyond - to understand challenges, gather insights, and co-create solutions. Whether it’s structuring an ambiguous problem, evaluating new data sources, or communicating a compelling recommendation, you’ll bring clarity and impact. This role is perfect for someone who loves solving problems, is comfortable navigating complexity, and sees data as a powerful tool, not an end in itself.

##### **Some of the things you’ll do**

* Tackle complex and ambiguous problems by bringing structure and taking clear, decisive action
* Translate complex data and information into concise, actionable insights using both qualitative and quantitative methods
* Collaborate across diverse teams to co-create smart solutions and drive real change
* Communicate insights clearly and confidently to stakeholders at all levels, from junior teams to senior leadership
* Continuously explore and integrate new internal and external data sources to strengthen our decision-making foundation
* Analyze data from multiple sources to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities
* Partner with teams to understand business challenges and build tailored tools or frameworks that improve how we work
* Act as a go-to person for analytical support—sharing knowledge, guiding ad-hoc analysis, and elevating decision quality across the company

##### **Your future team**


You’ll join a tight-knit, cross-functional team working on Instabee’s most critical challenges. We collaborate across departments, drive clarity in ambiguity, and value real-world impact over theoretical perfection. Curiosity, humility, and a strong drive to make things better are what bring us together.

##### **What we’re looking for**

* Bachelor’s degree within engineering, information technology, finance, economics or other relevant field
* Experience presenting solutions to senior management (for example management consulting or strategy consulting)
* Experience working within a data heavy environment for at least 2 years
* Experience working with solving business problems and improving ways of working
* Experience working with data processing tools including Front End visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, PowerBI, PowerPoint, Google Slides) and generic tools (e.g. SQL, Python, Excel/Google Sheets)
* Experience working in different departments (e.g. tech, product, and non-tech departments)

##### **The cherry on top**

* You bring a strong blend of business and data understanding—and know how to connect the two
* You’re curious, always learning, and stay on top of evolving best practices
* You care about creating real-world results and know when “good enough” is enough
* You’re confident challenging the status quo and backing it up with structured thinking
* You communicate clearly and effectively in English—even when things get complex

  

If this is you, then we can’t wait to meet you!

##### **What you’ll get**


We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like change and want to set new processes and ways of working—this is the place for you!

  

Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we also offer:


Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm  

Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work—we’ve got a whole floor for our furry friends!  

Fun & Games: Ping pong, shuffleboard, foosball—even a karaoke room!  

Parental Pay: Paid leave for six months to spend time with your little one  

Birthday Day Off: Celebrate your birthday with a well-earned break  

Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup and hours that work with your life  

Tech Breakfast Wednesdays: Midweek inspiration and tasty bites  

Tech Demos: Showcasing innovations from around the company  

Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology daily

##### **Diversity and inclusion**


Diversity and inclusion are very important to us, and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.


#LI-ML1

title: Data Analyst
description:
**YOUR MISSION AT VOI**
**Role**
 As a Data Analyst at Voi your primary responsibility will be to facilitate informed decision-making by providing actionable insights and recommendations based on data analysis. Your contributions will play a pivotal role in our ongoing success in the 12 countries we operate in. By joining Voi, you’re joining a truly data driven company where the data team is at the forefront:
   

  

* Build decision support tools using data, metrics and dashboards
* Guide operational decisions and help product teams build the best products
* Solve business and product problems through data analysis
* Present your insights and recommendations to stakeholders
* Extract, manipulate and visualize data to find and understand patterns
* Clean data to develop features and signals in a vast, unordered data set
* Help the organization learn from data by advising on performance indicators, tests and analytical methodologies
* Teach team members and lead the way for data driven ways of working


**What You’ll Need To Embark**
 Being part of our team means to challenge the status quo and to drive change where you see needed, both in terms of how we work internally and how our operations execute. We believe you have an ability and willingness to learn and adapt to a changing environment, it also means to be a great team player and help us build a fantastic place to work! In addition to being fluent in English we believe the right person has:
   

  

* Business interest, curiosity and creativity for efficient problem-solving
* Experience in translating challenging and open-ended stakeholder needs into valuable analytical solutions
* A few years of experience working as a Data Analyst in a autonomous and agile environment
* Strong SQL skills
* The ability to communicate your insights and findings in a captivating way
* Great communication skills, both for collaborating and for sharing insights
* Experience working with dbt and python is a plus
* A university degree in a relevant field (e.g. Mathematics, Statistics, Science, Engineering, Business)


**WHY VOI?**
 Working At Voi Is More Than Just a Job; Our People Promise Includes a Personal Voyage Where You Will Grow As a Professional And Be a Part Of a Team And Culture That Builds Something Meaningful For Society. In Addition To This You’ll Have The Opportunity To
   

  

* Join Europe’s #1 micromobility operator and one of the fastest growing scaleups
* Get “skin in the game” through our employee options program
* Work with inspiring, motivated and fun colleagues towards a common goal
* Join the micromobility revolution and be a part of creating sustainable cities made for living, free from noise and pollution


 Since 2018,
 **Voi** 
 has been on a mission to create safe, sustainable and reliable micromobility for everyone. Today we are the leading shared micromobility operator in Europe, with HQ in Stockholm (Sweden), operating 100,000+ vehicles in 100+ towns and cities across 12 countries, serving 7+ million riders with over 300+ MILLION rides to date, and we have no intention of stopping here! We believe that micromobility will play a central role in changing how people move in our towns and cities in the future and want to ensure that the micromobility transformation happens the right way - through real innovative technology, partnership and transparent dialogue with towns, cities and governments, and by adapting our products to the local needs. In addition to improving quality of life in cities around the world, we are contributing to the solution for climate change by making sustainable transportation options more widely available and promoting renewable energy use and circularity along our supply chain.
   

  

**Diversity Matters**
 As a Voiager, we offer you a friendly, collaborative and fast-paced workplace where you can bring your whole self to work, regardless of gender, age, ethnicity, religion, disability or sexual orientation - and welcome applications from whoever you are, including veterans, those actively serving as a Reservist and their partners. What is most important to us is how you treat others and what skills and value you bring to our team. We believe that having a wide diversity of people with different backgrounds and perspectives within Voi is essential to our success in delivering the best user experience to our equally diverse user base. With employees from over 50 nationalities working within Voi, we believe we have made good progress but know we can still do more - therefore we discourage any photos, personal letters, or disclosure of any information that concerns other information than your professional experience.

title: Experienced S/4 HANA Security and Control Consultants
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, and Consultative Services. With more than 457,000 professionals in over 150 countries, we help our clients and society to solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals. We are driven by one purpose: to make an impact that matters. To us, this means lasting results for our clients and their businesses, ideas and actions that contribute to a greater good. It also means empowering our people and supporting them in their growth journey.
   

  

  




**Job Description**

 Deloitte's Technology & Transformation practice helps organizations effectively measure and mitigate risk and make informed and intelligent risk decisions around business processes, technology and operations. Our Technology & Transformation team has grown significantly over the past five years.
   

  

  

  

 As part of our North and South Europe member firm, you will be joining our professional team delivering world-class advisory services across the Nordic region. Our inclusive culture forms the core of our firm – the reason why we can call Deloitte one of life’s greatest communities. We embrace and encourage authenticity and diversity of thought, as we understand that inclusion unleashes the power of our people – we understand that our diversity is a source of strength.
   

  

  





 You will be working on different projects in an international environment designing, implementing, upgrading and monitoring SAP authorization concepts. With the support of your team, you will guide the development of internal controls for our clients to achieve the required risk management level. Moreover, you will assist the client in setting up monitoring processes and tools to remain in total control of security in their SAP landscape and provide our clients with expert technical knowledge on SAP authorizations, good practice working methods and functional insight into the business drivers for Governance, Risk & Compliance (GRC) activities.
   

  

  





 You will play a key role on our team, collaborating with your team members to successfully deliver appropriate security solutions on multiple projects. We strive to create an environment where curiosity drives innovative solutions to our clients’ requirements.
   

  

  





 As we are expecting our local S/4 team to grow in coming years – you should be excited by the prospect of being part of building and developing the local business while still being closely connected and contributing to our community in the Nordics.
   

  

  




**Qualifications**

 As a skilled member of our S/4 and Controls Advisory team, we expect that you will be able to teach us something new, just as we are hoping to teach you something new. We are growing fast and are looking for strong consultants within a broad experience in the field of security and controls.
   

  

  





 You will essentially possess the following qualifications:
   

  

  




* You are an SAP security expert with 5+ years of experience from an advisory environment.
* You can design and implement best-practice SAP security blueprints, fit for the clients’ business frameworks. Essentially enabling technology to drive business transformations within Authorizations, Risk Management, Internal Controls, Information Security and Privacy.
* You are able to lead work for designing and implementing roles and access concepts, i.e. SAP Authorization Management and Hazardous Work Combinations (SoD).
* You have proven experience of implementing risk solutions in global companies using SAP solutions and the ability to assess business requirements, design solutions, produce functional analysis/technical documentation, and implement and test solutions.
* Security experience in S/4 HANA implementation and Fiori authorizations is a plus.
* You have experience of designing, configuring and implementing SAP GRC products, such as Access Control, Process Control and Business Integrity screening etc.
* You quickly understand the client environment and identify the client’s business requirements, building strong relationships.
* You have strong analytical skills combined with good communication and training skills.
* You can work independently, define targets and prioritize tasks in a complex and demanding environment.
* You can plan and execute a project to deliver a superior client experience. In addition, you can gain an in-depth knowledge of the client’s business and stay up-to-date on industry activities, marketplace trends, innovation efforts and leading practices.
* You are a team player who is committed, proactive, enthusiastic, flexible and eager to learn.
* You are willing to travel on a regular basis.


 To succeed in the role, you need to have an interest in both technical and organizational aspects of security, including ability to understand business contexts. As a consequence, you are able to communicate with stakeholders both from the business and technology/IT. You have excellent language skills in English and preferably also Swedish.
   

  

  

  

 You are keen to share your experiences, motivate your colleagues and help developing the team and business. You are a relationship-oriented person with a drive and desire to deliver top quality service to your clients. Finally, you are a highly-driven team player who enjoys developing the business, solving problems and likes to take on new challenges.
   

  

  

**Additional Information**

**How to apply**




 You apply online. We encourage you to apply as soon as possible, as we are screening applications continuously and interviewing on a rolling basis. Please submit your CV, cover letter and university grades as part of your application.
   

  

  

  

 As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/
   

  

  

  

**Questions**




 If you have any questions regarding the role, please contact Kateryna Krugliakova at kkrugliakova@deloitte.se. For questions regarding the application process, please contact Anna Cygnaeus, Talent Acquisition, at acygnaeus@deloitte.se.
   

  

  





**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: Arbetar du inom IT?
description:
”Ja?” tänker du, och vilken tur tänker vi och wiho för att vi på Centric nu väckt ditt intresse. Vi på Centric växer och behöver nu flera duktiga IT-konsulter inom framför allt 2nd line support inom IT-infrastruktur till flera av våra kunder i Stockholm. Är du nyfiken på nytt arbete? För vi är nyfikna på dig och dina kompetenser! Läs vidare nedan!
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du självklart en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Nu tänkte vi på Centric berätta lite mer om hur din vardag som IT-konsult kan se ut. Som IT-konsult på Centric tror vi att du är lika mån om din utveckling som vi är. Nämnde vi att du har fri tillgång till tusentals certifieringar? Japp, du hörde rätt. Oavsett vad dina kollegor på Centric arbetar med så har vi alla en gemensam nämnare – vi bryr oss om varandra! Som 2nd line tekniker kommer din vardag bestå av varierande arbetsuppgifter; det kan exempelvis handla om allt från att lösa komplexa IT-problem till att lösa incidenter och vara spindeln i nätet i verksamheten. Som du förstår så kommer dina arbetsuppgifter att variera beroende på vilken kund du arbetar hos, dock garanterar vi dig ett utvecklande och spännande uppdrag inom IT!
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 För att passa i rollen som 2nd line tekniker tror vi att du är en guru på problemlösning och drivs av att hitta lösningar. Du säger inte direkt nej till en utmaning, eller hur? Var svaret på frågan nej, är det helt klart dig vi vill komma i kontakt med! Vi ser gärna att du har arbetat minst tre år i en liknande roll. Vi tror också att du har en bra social förmåga, är serviceminded och en lagspelare.
   

  

*Skallkrav*
* Minst tre års erfarenhet inom IT-support
* Kompetens inom Active Directory och uppsättning av GPOer
* Kunskaper inom Microsoft 365, Microsoft Exchange, Azure Portalen
* Erfarenhet av ett eller flera ärendehanteringssystem
* Uttrycker dig väl på svenska och engelska – i både tal och skift


*Meriterande*
* Högskoleutbildning inom IT
* Körkort


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi sätter stort värde på att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Intresseanmälan IT-drifttekniker
description:
Vad innebär det att vara IT-drifttekniker hos oss?
   

  

 Som IT-drifttekniker hos oss spelar du en central roll i att hålla företagets tekniska lösningar igång och fungerande. Du ser till att system, nätverk och datorer alltid är operativa – för att tekniken aldrig ska stå i vägen för det viktiga arbetet som pågår. Din insats gör skillnad dagligen, och du är en viktig del av att skapa en IT-miljö som både är stabil och säker.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna kan variera beroende på uppdrag, men här är några av de områden du kan komma att jobba med:
   

  

* Systemadministratör: Drift och underhåll av servrar (Windows/Linux), säkerställande av systemuppdateringar och tillgänglighet.
* Nätverkstekniker / Nätverksadministratör: Hantering av nätverksinfrastruktur, inklusive switchar, routrar och VPN, samt arbete med övervakning och kapacitetsplanering.
* Databasadministratör: Ansvara för databassystem, säkerställa prestanda, säkerhet och backup, samt återställning.


**Vad söker vi hos dig?**
 Vi söker dig som brinner för teknik och har ett genuint intresse för att driva och utveckla IT-lösningar. Utöver det har du:
   

  

* Yrkesutbildning inom IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Tidigare erfarenhet inom systemadministration, nätverksteknik, databasadministration eller annan liknande specialistroll med fokus på förvaltning och förbättring.
